title: Type Design
content:
Hi everyone! :D  
My name is Joel and I’m portuguese.  
I’m a type fanatic and I’m interested in a graduation in type design!  
I’m looking at a course that combines type design history and type design skills!  
Can you tell me a place where I can do it?

Thnks in advance!

have a look here:  
 [Education](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905085348/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/Education)

Phillip Stamm is teaching a five-day type design workshop in [Basel](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905085348/http:/www.baselschoolofdesign.ch/) this summer. Switzerland isn’t a bad flight from Portugal!
The MA in Typeface Design from Reading seems to fit your requirements. They have a strong academic element combined with the creative and practical aspects of type design.
